column7: luz moved to new york to assist gloria and shelbert in raising their child daniel. tia mothered and took care of daniel as if he was her own child. daniel was her universe; she made certain that all his needs were taken care of while gloria and shelbert worked. luz elena (tia) lived a very simple life
column8: always willing to give to others with little fanfare or praise. tia was a devout catholic that looked forward to going to church every sunday until she wasnt able to attend due to difficulty in walking. tia was a very proud woman that did not like anyone making a fuss over her. she loved her family and enjoyed making a fuss over them. she also enjoyed going on family trips and just being around family. her mission in life was to make everyone else happy. tia was the glue that held the family together. at all family functions
column9: she could be found in the kitchen making her favorite dishes and seeing the joy that it brought to the faces of the family. tia is survived in new york by her brother hernando cifuentes and his wife herlinda and nieces and nephews
